RACE.RACE_TEXT: POCATELLO DOWNS RACE 5 300 Y Dirt CR: 73. Final Purse 3375. MIXED BREED BITTERROOT FUTURITY NOMINATED HORSES PREFERRED. $500 added by Hawthorne Animal Hospital.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: POCATELLO DOWNS RACE 6 300 Y Dirt CR: 70. Allowance Purse 3300. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS & OLDER WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. $500 added by Hawthorne Animal Hospital. Three Year Olds 124 lbs. Older 126 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JS WHOS THAT LADY wire to wire. KIRKLYNS CANDY game 2econd. EH THREE AM ICON held on for third. CASANOVA PRINCE steady effort. THE STREAKIN QUEEN reared in gate.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Harvest Cup Paint & Appy Futurity POCATELLO DOWNS RACE 7 350 Y Dirt CR: 53. Futurity Purse 7500. FOR TWO YEAR OLDS REMAINING ELIGIBLE. $2,000 from Rocky Mtn Stallion Auction. Weights: 124 lbs.
